title: Very broad copyright license on your content

tosdr.tldr: The copyright licence of Instagram has significantly changed in 2013. The license you grant them is now beyond the requirements for operating the service. For instance, it includes the right for Instagram to transfer the license or to license it to others on their terms (“sublicense”).
